section.title: CommandSender
section.para: The sender is able to invoke an external command (specified by the target property) in a separate process to send a message payload. The payload can be passed to the standard input of the process (default behavior) or as the command argument. That is configurable via messageFrom proerty.
The target of the sender is a path to the file containing the commands that are to be executed.
Message properties and headers are passed to the process as the environmental variables.

row.entry: Specifies where the message is taken from by the sender. The supported values are stdin or arguments
